metadata.title: Good News Bible Church | Bilingual Church in Ashburn, VA
metadata.description: A bilingual Russian-English Bible church in Ashburn, Virginia serving the Slavic community. Join us Sundays at 1:30 PM for worship, fellowship, and spiritual growth.

hero.subtitle: A bilingual Russian-English Bible church serving Greater DC Slavic community.

about.title: Serving the Slavic Community in Northern Virginia
about.paragraph1: We are a family of believers from Russia, Ukraine, the former Soviet Union, and America — united by faith in Jesus Christ. Our bilingual services in Russian and English welcome immigrants, their families, and all who seek authentic community, spiritual growth, and opportunities to serve together.
about.paragraph2: Whether you're a new immigrant or have called this area home for years, you'll find a warm, welcoming community ready to embrace you and walk alongside you in your faith journey.
about.motto: Bring God's Joy to All People

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you want to know about our church
faq.sideDescription: We know visiting a new church can bring questions. Here are answers to some of the most common ones.

language.question: Is the service in Russian or English?
language.answer: Our services are bilingual! Sermons alternate between Russian and English, with translation always available. Worship songs include both languages so everyone can participate.

children.question: Do you have programs for children?
children.answer: Yes! We offer Sunday School for children ages 3-13 during the main service. We also have Friday youth group for teenagers.

denomination.question: What denomination are you?
denomination.answer: We are a nondenominational Bible church. Our focus is on Scripture, the Gospel of Jesus Christ, and authentic Christian community.

connect.question: How can I connect with other families?
connect.answer: Join one of our Home Groups meeting throughout Northern Virginia, or simply stay for coffee after the service — we'd love to introduce you to others!
